Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: The likely culprit: FAB-5591. Investigating further.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: now that we are doing startup timeouts properly the value of timeout _does_ matter. We need to bump up the time out in the chaincode tests to make sure they are sufficiently large to take care of startup timeouts (esp. in those tests that actually create docker images).
